name: Carrying Capacity
description:
Scroll wheel to zoom in and out and left or right drag to look around.

Edit the settings and experiment to see how the ecosystem simulation is affected. The goal is to keep the predators alive for as long as possible (or forever?), but you can do whatever you want!

This game was created in one weekend for the Butterscotch Shenanijam 2019

THEME: DNA Chaos

Achievements: Mozart, Maverick

Thanks for playing! =)
